RECORD_A.CROPS_OR_ANIMALS: Crop(s) or type of Animal per unit
RECORD_A.CURRENT_STATUS: Current Status - mark one per Unit
RECORD_A.INDIVIDUAL_PRODUCTION_UNIT: for each individual Production Unit (eg. Site/Field/GH/Defined Area -   as appropriate for your Operation and labelled on your map)
RECORD_A.PLEASE_VERIFY: Please verify details and make any necessary changes annually. If Operation operates multiple separate Sites, please be sure to describe each site separately. Please refer to the sample tab provided below for examples of how to complete this form.
RECORD_A.SIZE_IN_PREFERRED_UNIT: Size in Preferred Unit of Measure

RECORD_D.HEADER: Record D- Seed and Planting Stock

NOTE.LIST_ALL: List ALL seed and planting stock used during the reporting period.  Please note:
NOTE.ONE: Ensure that purchase receipts, labels, tags and organic certificates for all seed/stock is available for review during inspection.

TWO.PART_3: is used, the following documentation is required to be available at inspection
TWO.A: Commercial Availability Search per COS 5.3- (Record D1 or equivalent)
TWO.C: Documentation confirming that any treatments, such as inoculants or seed coatings are PSL compliant (note: NOP compliance is not sufficient)

TABLE_COLUMN.IS_SEARCH_COMPLETED: If Non-CO Seed/Stock, is a Search completed (Y/N)

NOTE.LIST_ALL: List ALL Inputs used in the last 12 months or since your last submitted Record I.   You may choose to use this document to keep a running record of inputs used throughout the season.
NOTE.PLEASE_USE_SEPARATE_RECORD: Please use a separate Input Record for each category of input as described below and upload each in the corresponding upload location of Section 99 - Uploads:

ONE.PART_1: Soil Amendments, crop nutrition, crop production aids and materials:
ONE.PART_2: eg. as mulches, fertilizers, foliar sprays, compost, manure, potting soil mixes or components, peat moss, soil amendments etc.

NOTE.TWO: Cleaners, disinfectants, sanitizers, facility pest management substances.
NOTE.PREP_INPUTS: Note: Preparation Inputs:  Food additives, Other ingredients, Processing aids are to be listed on Record PM - Processing Master Ingredients and processing aids list.
NOTE.LIVESTOCK_INPUTS: Note: Livestock Inputs: Feed, feed additives and feed supplements, health care products and production aids, animal bedding etc.  are to be listed on Record LI-Livestock Inputs.

TABLE_COLUMN.CROP_FIELD_APPLIED_TO: Crop / Field Applied to or Production Unit used in
